job_description: Responsible for designing and developing user-facing web applications.
job_responsibility: Develop responsive UI, maintain website components, collaborate with backend developers.

experiences: 2+ years of experience in front-end development with React.js.

job_responsibility: Write clean and efficient code, participate in code reviews, collaborate with team members.

experiences: Familiarity with Python and JavaScript; any prior internship experience is a plus.

job_responsibility: Write clean, efficient code for web, mobile, and desktop applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement software solutions.
educational_requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
experiences: 3+ years of experience in software development, with expertise in programming languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript.

job_description: Develop server-side logic, define and maintain databases.
job_responsibility: Build scalable backend services, integrate APIs, ensure data security.

experiences: 3+ years of experience in backend development with Node.js.

job_description: Develop and maintain mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms.
job_responsibility: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design new features.
experiences: 2+ years of experience in mobile development using Flutter or React Native.

job_responsibility: Automate infrastructure provisioning, monitor system performance.

experiences: 4+ years of experience in DevOps, with AWS or Azure knowledge.

job_description: Analyze data trends and patterns to provide actionable insights.
job_responsibility: Work with large datasets, create data visualization dashboards.

experiences: 2+ years of experience in data analysis with proficiency in SQL and Python.

job_description: Develop and maintain both frontend and backend components of web applications.
job_responsibility: Create user-friendly UIs, design RESTful APIs, maintain databases.

experiences: 4+ years of experience with JavaScript, React, and Node.js.

job_description: Ensure the quality and functionality of software products through rigorous testing.
job_responsibility: Design test cases, automate testing, report and track defects.

job_description: Design, implement, and maintain company-wide network infrastructure.
job_responsibility: Monitor network performance, troubleshoot issues, ensure network security.
